name: snabbdom-ts
description: A quick version of snabbdom written in Typescript (hopefully merged into mainline)

scripts.clean: rimraf h.* htmldomapi.* index.* interfaces.* is.* thunk.* util.* vnode.* helpers modules lib dist
scripts.postchangelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(CHANGELOG): append to changelog' && git push origin master
scripts.test:browser: browserify test/index.ts -p tsify > tests-bundle.js && testem && rm tests-bundle.js
scripts.test:browser-ci: browserify test/index.ts -p tsify > tests-bundle.js && testem ci && rm tests-bundle.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:browser-ci
scripts.build:es2015: tsc -declaration --module es2015 --moduleResolution node --noFallthroughCasesInSwitch --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --noUnusedLocals --outDir lib/ --preserveConstEnums --pretty --sourceMap --strictNullChecks --target es2015 src/*.ts src/**/*.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:dist
scripts.postpublish: npm run changelog && npm run clean

author: Tylor Steinberger <tlsteinberger167@gmail.com> (github.com/TylorS)
